thread.title: Great location & beautiful hotel
thread.title_full: Great location & beautiful hotel - Review of Select Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: GinaBeo
title: Great location & beautiful hotel
text: Stayed two nights and had a wonderful experience. Staff were very friendly and helpful....they provided us with a room upon an early arrival. Room itself was describe as 'small/cosy' but we found it plenty big and very comfortable, quiet, modern but with character. Good continental Breakfast was included in a very reasonable rate. Near metro and easy commute from airport. Shops, cafes, restaurants and entertainment on the doorstep. Two thumbs up for this little gem.
